string.value: A Visit from the Wolf Herd
#b#p1202007##k, the penguin from #b#m140000000##k, wants to have a word with you.

A pack of wolves apparently paid a visit to #m140000000# in search of #t1902016#. It must be the family that #t1902016# lost as a pup. You should meet #b#p1202008##k and ask why they're here all of a sudden. #p1202008# is waiting at #m914030000##k, which can be accessed through #b#m140010100#.

Hey, Aran! There's a problem here! #bA giant pack of wolves#k came by, wanting to see you! I asked why, and they said they had recently lost a wolf pup, and that they'd heard of rumors that you might be holding onto it! I am very certain they are talking about #t1902016#!

I wonder what they are here for…are they here to take back #t1902016#...? That would be really terrible. Regardless of the circumstances, I say that as the master of #t1902015#, you'll have to face the pack yourself. Please go meet the group of #b#p1202008##k.
They said that they'll send their representative wolf to #b#m140010200##k. It's a wolf, though it looked quite proper…but watch out for them regardless.
They said they'll wait for you until you decide to meet them…so don't you think it'll be better to just go see them?
Are you the one holding onto our baby?
Have you met #p1202008#? It promised to wait for you in #b#m914030000##k, which you can reach through #b#m140010100##k.
